A Gap

14 May 2013

It's been 13 days since Last posted in my 'A Post A Day For May' challenge. Yes it really is a challenge. Trying to come up with something original to say every day. Find the time to write it, in a way that is interesting to read, is quite a tall order.

It's not that I'm short on ideas. Here's a quick snapshot of my current writing list. Feel free to use the comments if there is something that you'd like to hear more about.

  • Stupid testing
  • HTML5 and mobile capabilities (research)
  • The importance of wireframes
  • Playing to your strengths
  • Workflow - from Siri to Things
  • Javascript and accessibility
  • Real copy in wireframes
  • Web push notifications for the mobile web (research)
  • How to write annotations
  • File name formats
  • LinkedIn endorsements and value
  • Your website as a framework

And with that I may get back on track. More tomorrow.
